name: CheckIn
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message: Sorry to hear that you are not having a good day. It is completely normal to be going through a difficult time now. Remember that you are not alone.
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message: So good to hear that you are doing well. What a wonderful feeling!
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message: Sometimes we're up. Sometimes we're down. And sometimes we are neither up nor down...and that's totally okay!
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message: Here's a video to help you get through the day!
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message: Here's an audio message to help you get through the day!
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message: Here is a short activity that can help when you are feeling like needing some more support to get through the day.
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message: Recognise what is happening for you in this moment. What are you thinking? Are your thoughts positive or negative. How do you feel? Do you feel pleasant or unpleasant? How does your body feel? Do you feel tense or relaxed?
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message: Sit comfortably and close your eyes. Connect to your heart in a kind and gentle way. You may want to place one hand on your heart or chest. Say the following words silently to yourself:
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Notice if you feel any different.
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message:
May I be peaceful.
May I be safe.
May I be healthy.
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message: If you ever need additional support to help you cope with any stress or other emotional difficulties, type "Help". Chat to you later!
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness

name: CheckIn
text message:
May I be happy.
May there be love in my family.
May I feel loved.
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Loving Kindness
